wikipedia_page.main: Liam Jack Hurt (born 15 March 1994) is an English first class cricketer. He made his List A debut for Leicestershire in the 2015 Royal London One-Day Cup on 6 August 2015. He made his Twenty20 debut on 26 August 2019, for Lancashire in the 2019 t20 Blast. Hurt made his first class County Championship Division 2 debut against former club Leicestershire on 23 September 2019.
